codeSystems.name: CDexPOUCodes
codeSystems.title: CDex Purpose of Use Value Set
codeSystems.description: The set of purpose of use (POU) codes for requesting data. This code set is composed of [FHIR core Purpose of Use security labels](http://hl7.org/fhir/security-labels.html#core) and additional codes defined by this Guide.

codeSystems.name: CDexClaimUseCodes
codeSystems.title: CDex Claim Use Value Set
codeSystems.description: The purpose of a Claim resource and the reason for attachments. It includes the codes "preauthorization" and "claim".

codeSystems.name: CDexDataRequestTaskCode
codeSystems.title: CDex Data Request Task Code Value Set
codeSystems.description: Codes used to identify the type of data request. It includes the codes “data-request-query”, “data-request-code”, and “data-request-questionnaire”.

codeSystems.name: CDexIdentifierTypes
codeSystems.title: CDex Identifier Types Value Set
codeSystems.description: Identifier types for providers and organizations. It includes the codes “TAX” and “NPI”.

codeSystems.name: CDexLOINCAttachmentCodesValueSet
codeSystems.title: CDex LOINC Attachment Codes Value Set
codeSystems.description: This value set includes LOINC terms that can be sent by a payer as part of an HL7 attachment request for additional information. It has been curated by the HL7 Payer/Provider Information Exchange (PIE) Work Group.  More information about using LOINC in HIPAA attachments and the source of this value set can be found at [LOINC Attahments](https://loinc.org/attachments/).

codeSystems.name: CDexPWK01AttachmentReportTypeCodeValueSet
codeSystems.title: CDex PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code Value Set
codeSystems.description:
In addition to using LOINC attachment codes, a payer may request for additional information from the provider to support a prior authorization request using X12's PWK01 Attachment Report Type Code.

Note that the PWK01 codes will not be published in due to X12 IP restrictions.

codeSystems.name: CDexWorkQueueCodes
codeSystems.title: CDex Work Queue Value Set
codeSystems.description: The set work queue tags that the provider may use in their workflow to process requests. This code set is composed of codes defined by this Guide.
